NK010(tha)034:0: phur pa'i gtor 'bul bar chad kun sel bzhugs so //
NK010(tha)034:1: h'u khro rgyal dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu bzhengs //
NK010(tha)034:2: thugs kyi sras mchog badz+ra k+ai la ya //
NK010(tha)034:3: 'jigs byed khro bo khro mo khra thabs dang //
NK010(tha)034:4: sprul pa yang sprul sum sprul pho nya'i tshogs gdug pa'i dgra bgegs khug la phur pas rgyob //
NK010(tha)034:5: bar chad dam sri thal ba'i rdul du rlog /
NK010(tha)034:7: dam nyams dgra bgegs bsgral ba las byung ba'i //
NK010(tha)034:8: sha ri khrag mtsho 'dod rgu'i ba ling+ta //
NK010(tha)034:9: ye shes bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'di bzhes la //
NK010(tha)034:10: rnal 'byor 'dod pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK010(tha)034:11: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya sarba big nam bam
NK010(tha)034:12: h'u phata dzahmh'u +aah sa pa ri w+aa ra i
NK010(tha)034:13: dam ba ling+ta kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi /
NK010(tha)034:14: zhes bka' brgyad rdzong 'phrang las gsungs pa'i rdo rje'i
NK010(tha)034:15: tshig la rjes kyi sho lo ka gcig bsnan te
